item.title: Building a web app, the progressive way
item.description: And finding an unconventional solution to a challenging objective (I’ve also posted this article over on Medium.) As a passionate developer I’m aways juggling side projects alongside my pay-the-bills work. Earlier this year I secured some great tickets to the Eurovision Song Contest and in the excitement I decided to build a modern web app to explore and discover the history of the annual show.
